IN.IC: je oblika za preteklik in pretekli deležnik, čeprav je

sense.def:
Light
je luč, ki nam omogoči, da stvari vidimo, in prihaja od sonca, lune, svetilke ali ognja.

seg.quote: We are dependent on the sun for heat and light.
By the light of a torch, she began to read.

sense.def:
A light
je vse, kar oddaja svetlobo, zlasti električna žarnica.

seg.quote: She went into her daughter's room and turned on the light.

sense.def:
Kadar kraj ali predmet
is lit by something
, nanj ali v njem sije luč.

seg.quote: ...a room lit by candles.
He looked up thoughtfully at the lighted windows.

sense.def:
Kadar je stavba ali soba
light
, je v njej veliko naravne svetlobe.

It is light outside
lahko rečemo, kadar je dan.

Barve, ki so
light
, so zelo blede.

seg.quote: ...light blue eyes.

sense.def:
To light something
pomeni povzročiti, da nekaj začne goreti.

seg.quote: Light the gas fire if you feel chilly.
...a lighted candle.

sense.def:
To ask someone for a light
pomeni želeti vžigalico ali vžigalnik, da lahko prižgemo cigareto.

To see something in a particular light
pomeni o nečem misliti na določen način.

seg.quote: We were now seeing things in a different light.

sense.def:
Kar je
light
, ne tehta veliko ali ni veliko po količini ali moči.

seg.quote: The bag was very light, as though there were nothing in it.
A light rain was falling.
The traffic on the highway was light that day.
...the extreme lightness of this particular shoe.

sense.def:
Delo, ki je
light
, ne zahteva veliko telesnega napora.

seg.quote: He has grown much weaker and is now capable of only light work.

sense.def:
Gibi ali dejanja, ki so
light
, so mili in nežni.

seg.quote: She runs up the stairs two at a time with her light graceful step.
He kissed his wife lightly on the cheek.
For a heavy man he moves with surprising lightness and speed.

sense.def:
Knjige, igre ali skladbe, ki so
light
, nas zabavajo in ne povzročajo, da bi ob njih zelo globoko razmišljali.

seg.quote: ...light entertainment and comedy.

sense.def:
To set light to something
pomeni povzročiti, da nekaj začne goreti.

Kadar nov podatek
throws light on something
ali
casts light on something
, povzroči, da tisto laže razumemo.

seg.quote: His diaries throw a new light upon certain incidents.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
comes to light
ali
is brought to light
, postane znano.

cit.quote: priti na dan, izkazati se, pokazati se

seg.quote: It has come to light that he was lying.

sense.def:
In the light of something
pomeni glede na nekaj ali če nekaj vzamemo v poštev.

seg.quote: This development is significant in the light of what happened later.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
lights up a place or object
, razliva svetlobo na celoten prostor ali predmet.

seg.quote: The fire was still blazing, lighting up the sky.

sense.def:
Kadar naš obraz ali oči
light up
, smo na lepem videti zelo srečni.

seg.quote: His face lit up at the sight of Cynthia.

sense.def:
To light up a cigarette or pipe
pomeni začeti kaditi cigareto ali pipo.

seg.quote: George lit up and puffed away for a while.
